name: What Time It Is
description:
For eons L#R (pronounced LOOOR) the cosmic God of Impact has tolerated the presence of the peaceful DIGITOIDS who exist on planet ANVIL. Now their time time has come...the time of the prophecy...the time that what it is...

SETTING:

Anvil II - An all but inhospitable micro-planet somewhere in the inscrutable and unknown outer cosmos. The surface is mineral; a course terrain of craggy concrete, gravel, with jutting formations of unyielding metal "hills." Primitive DIGITOIDS poked craters in the surface for shelter from cosmic lightning and gravel storms. The doomed generation have constructed shining crystalline edifices. This arrogance will not go unhammered. 

GAMEPLAY: 

Space Pirate Trainer meets Axegend meets Tempest with casual rhythm mechanics.

MUSIC:

https://soundcloud.com/davidspegasus/sets/what-time-it-is-vrjam2020-ost-davids-p...
